tool_description: Analyzes tax returns and related documents to extract income patterns, deductions, and financial stability indicators for underwriting assessment.

tax_year.description: Tax year for the return being analyzed

filing_status.description: Tax filing status (single, married_joint, married_separate, head_of_household)

investment_income.description: Income from investments and capital gains

previous_year_agi.description: Previous year's AGI for trend analysis

error_messages: Invalid tax year: Year must be between 2010 and current year
Invalid filing status: Use one of [single, married_joint, married_separate, head_of_household]
Income calculation error: Gross income must be greater than or equal to AGI
Negative values not allowed: All income and tax amounts must be non-negative
Inconsistent data: AGI after deductions should reasonably align with tax owed
usage: Provide tax_year, filing_status, and all required income/tax amounts. Optional fields include business_income, investment_income, and previous_year_agi for enhanced analysis. Returns comprehensive income analysis and stability metrics.

income_classification.description: Primary income source classification (salary, business, mixed, investment)

income_stability_score.description: Stability score from 0-100 based on income sources and patterns

year_over_year_change.description: Percentage change from previous year if data available

effective_tax_rate.description: Calculated effective tax rate as percentage

risk_indicators.description: Array of potential risk factors identified
